article:
Cloze test
Choose the best answer to complete the passage.
I like collecting stamps very much.Do you like collecting stamps? How long have you been collecting them?I have been collecting them _ I was eight years old .I have collected hundreds of stamps.Now I will tell you something about _  .
Stamp collecting began in 1854. As time goes on, there are more and more   _   of stamps. These stamps are very beautiful and interesting .There are many wonderful  _   on them . And there are more and more stamp collectors. Not only children  _  also men and women collect stamps. In 1927, America began  _  all kinds of stamps to the collectors. In some countries there are even  _   on collecting stamps in school s.People all over the world are becoming more and more interested in collecting stamps.
Each picture on a stamp has its  _  in it . It may be a portrait of a great leader,a famous scientist or a writer.It may be a beautiful bird or fish. It may be a(n) _ place where people wish to go. Every stamp  _  a story.
